alert.note: Alert for Blackfoot Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 13 at 3:54AM MST until January 13 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 PM MST SUNDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 4 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches, except 7 to 10 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. * WHERE...Grace, Soda Springs, Henry, and Bone. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 8 AM MST this morning. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 5 PM this afternoon to 2 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
